original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rgya mtsho'i blo zhes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan bye ba ste /🔽thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o //🔽dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /🔽mchod rten ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa ste gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rgya mtsho'i blo zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan bye ba ste / thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo // sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o // dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go / mchod rten ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa ste gcig tu zad do //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Mind of the Ocean; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Ocean of Virtue.🔽He will hold ten billion assemblies, each num bering one thousand times ten million.🔽His life will span ninety thousand years, and the holy D harm a will rem ain a further ninety thousand years.🔽His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa extending for twelve yojanas.🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug med par gnas pa skye ba'i yul ni sgrib pa med pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug med par gnas pa skye ba'i yul ni sgrib pa med pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Mind of the Ocean; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Ocean of Virtue. He will hold ten billion assemblies, w ith each assembly num bering one thousand times ten million. His life will span ninety thousand years, and the holy D harm a will rem ain a further ninety thousand years. His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa extending for twelve yojanas. ( The Tathagata Asitatapasa will have as birthplace the land called Light W ithout Obstruction. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for five h u n d red yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Gift of Jewels; his m other’s nam e will be Light Rays of the Gods. His son will be called Finest God; his principal attendant will be known as Intent on Virtue. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Faultless Mind; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Mind of the Ocean.

original: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //🔽'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o //🔽yab ni rin chen gtong zhes @412b bya'o; ;yum ni lha'i 'od zer zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni lha mchog ces bya'o //🔽rim gro pa ni yon tan gzhol zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni skyon med sems zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //🔽'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o //🔽yab ni rin chen gtong zhes @412b bya'o; ;yum ni lha'i 'od zer zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni lha mchog ces bya'o //🔽rim gro pa ni yon tan gzhol zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni skyon med sems zhes bya'o //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for five hundred yojanas.🔽His father’s nam e will be Gift of Jewels; his m other’s nam e will be Light Rays of the Gods.🔽His son will be called Finest God; his principal attendant will be called Intent on Virtue.🔽The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Mind w ithout Fault;🔽

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni thar ba'i phung po 'od ces bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu rtsa drug ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni thar ba'i phung po 'od ces bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu rtsa drug ste /
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Light of the Aggregate of Liberation; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Light of the Aggregate of Liberation.

original: thams cad la'ang khri phrag bcu gsum bcu gsum mo //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang khri phrag bcu gsum bcu gsum mo //
translated: He will hold ninety-six assemblies, w ith each assembly num bering thirteen th o u ­ sand.

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo; ;dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so //
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo; ;dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so //
translated: His life will span one h u n d red th o u ­ sand years, and the holy D harm a will rem ain a further one th o u ­ sand years.

original: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: His relics will be extensive.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rma med pa skye ba'i yul ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya'o //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rma med pa skye ba'i yul ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya'o // rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
translated: The Tathagata Asadharana will have as birthplace the land called Source of All Virtues.

original: 'od ni dpag tshad bzhi stong ngo //🔽yab ni kun tu 'od ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad bzhi stong ngo // yab ni kun tu 'od ces bya'o //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for four th o u ­ sand yojanas.

analyzed: yum ni de ldan ma zhes bya'o // sras ni rnam par snang byed mig ces bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Light of the Universe; his m other’s nam e will be Lady of the Dharma.

original: rim gro pa ni kun du gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni kun du gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Eye of Illumination; his principal attendant will be known as Abiding Everywhere.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal spyod ces bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal spyod ces bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Strength of Action; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Light of the Aggregate of Liberation.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan mtha' yas grags zhes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu ste //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan mtha' yas grags zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu ste //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Boundless Qualities; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Renowned for Boundless Qualities.

analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mo // sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang lo drug khri'i bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /

analyzed: mchod rten ni dpag tshad bco lnga pa ste / gcig tu zad do //

translated: The Tathagata Asama­rtidhvaja will have as birthplace the land called Most Excellent Renunciation.

original: rigs ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze'o //
translated: He will be of priestly descent,

original: 'od ni dpag tshad drug go /
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad drug go /

analyzed: yab ni lha mchod ces bya'o //

analyzed: yum ni bzang ldan ma zhes bya'o //

analyzed: sras ni rtsal po che zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rim gro pa ni mthu rtsal mthong zhes bya'o //

analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o //

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog na dbyangs snyan gnas zhes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog na dbyangs snyan gnas zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste /
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Sweet Melody; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Abiding in Sweet Song.

original: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mo //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni 'bum mo //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mo // sku tshe'i tshad ni 'bum mo //
translated: He will hold thirty assemblies, w ith each assembly num bering one h u n d red thousand times ten million.

original: dam pa'i chos kyang lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /🔽mchod rten ni dpag tshad drug pa ste /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go / mchod rten ni dpag tshad drug pa ste /
translated: His life will span one h u n d red thousand years, and the holy Dharm a will rem ain a further one h u n d red thousand years.

original: gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: gcig tu zad do //
translated: His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa extending for six yojanas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mchog mkhyen skye ba'i yul ni sgron ma mchog ces bya'o //🔽rigs ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mchog mkhyen skye ba'i yul ni sgron ma mchog ces bya'o // rigs ni bram ze'o //

original: 'od ni dpag tshad sum cu'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad sum cu'o //
translated: He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for thirty yojanas.

original: yab ni tog ces bya'o; ;yum ni yid 'thad dpal zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni legs mthong zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni tog ces bya'o; ;yum ni yid 'thad dpal zhes bya'o // sras ni legs mthong zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Torch; his m other’s nam e will be Glory of the Mind’s Approval.

original: rim gro pa ni zhum mdo ces bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes me tog gces bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni zhum mdo ces bya'o // shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes me tog gces bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Fine to See; his principal attendant will be known as Heart of the Sun.

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o //

analyzed: 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa lnga ste //

original: gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: gcig tu zad do //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ther mchog dga' zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Roaring the Lion’s Roar; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Joyful Vehicle.

original: thams cad la'ang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo //🔽sku tshe tshad ni lo bzhi khri bzhi stong ngo //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo // sku tshe tshad ni lo bzhi khri bzhi stong ngo //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang lo bzhi khri zhi stong gi bar du gnas so //

original: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs so; ;'od ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo //

analyzed: yab ni blo gros bsod nams gsal zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Clear Merit of the Mind; his m other’s nam e will be Lady of the Moon.

analyzed: yum ni lha mchod ces bya'o // sras ni gzi brjid mtha' yas lta zhes bya'o //

original: rim gro pa ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'jig rten mchod ces bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mi'i zla ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'jig rten mchod ces bya'o // shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mi'i zla ba zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Boundless Brilliance; his principal attendant will be called Worship of the Directions and the Intervening Spaces.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan dpag tu med pa'i 'od ces bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa gsum ste //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan dpag tu med pa'i 'od ces bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa gsum ste //

analyzed: thams cad la'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ther 'bum phrag nyi shu nyi shu'o //

original: sku tshe'i @417b tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o //
analyzed: sku tshe'i @417b tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o //

analyzed: thams cad byang chub du yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dam ba'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so //
translated: and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further ten million years in order to bring all to spiritual m aturation.

original: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra las rgyal pa skye ba'i yul zhi kha dog zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya'o //

original: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //

analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad drug stong drug brgya'o //

analyzed: yab ni legs mthong zla ba zhes bya'o; ;yum ni dgra bcom dga' mchod ces bya'o //

analyzed: sras ni ye shes mchog rigs 'dzin ces bya'o //

analyzed: rim gro pa ni lha sems zhes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Mind of the Gods.

analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sengge'i mthu rtsal sems zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni grags pa mtha' yas gsal zhes bya'o //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa ni grangs med de //

analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad dgu bcu'o //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for ninety yojanas.

original: rim gro pa ni blo gros mchog ces bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mchod 'os kha lo sgyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni blo gros mchog ces bya'o // shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mchod 'os kha lo sgyur zhes bya'o //

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni shin tu grags pa zhes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu rtsa dgu ste //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni shin tu grags pa zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu rtsa dgu ste //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Charioteer Worthy of Worship; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Very Famous.

original: thams cad la'ang sa ya phrag dgu dgu'o //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang sa ya phrag dgu dgu'o // sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /

original: mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //

analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzhi'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pas bstod pa skye ba'i yul ni blo gros grags pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The Tathagata Aryastuta will have as birthplace the land called Renowned Intellect.

original: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
translated: He will be of princely descent,

original: 'od ni dpag tshad dgu khri'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad dgu khri'o //
translated: and his light will extend for ninety thousand yojanas.

original: yab ni mtha' yas sbed ces bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni mtha' yas sbed ces bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Hidden Boundless;

original: yum ni grags pa'i phreng ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni grags pa'i phreng ba zhes bya'o //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Garland of Gloiy.

original: sras ni lha sbed ces bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni lha sbed ces bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Hidden by Gods;

original: rim gro pa ni grags pa spong zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni grags pa spong zhes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Abandoning Glory.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten kun gyis mchod ces bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten kun gyis mchod ces bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as W orshiped by All the World;

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ston pa grags zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan bco brgyad de /
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Graced w ith Glory; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Teacher of Glory.

original: thams cad la'ang bye ba 'bum phrag bco brgyad bco brgyad do //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba 'bum phrag bco brgyad bco brgyad do //
translated: He will hold eighteen assemblies, w ith each assembly num bering one h u n d red thousand times ten million.

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o //
